content: विच्छित्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} ({%a%}) Cutting off or asunder, tearing off; <ls>Bh. 3. 11.</ls> ({%b%}) Breaking off, fracture. {@--2@} Dividing, separating. {@--3@} Disappearance, absence, loss. {@--4@} Cessation. {@--5@} Colouring the body with paints and unguents, painting colours, rouge; विच्छित्तिशेषैः सुरसुंदरीणां <ls>Ś. 7. 5</ls>; <ls>Śi. 16. 84.</ls> {@--6@} Limit, boundary (of a house &c.). {@--7@} A pause in a verse, cæsura. {@--8@} A particular kind of amorous gesture, consisting in carelessness in dress and decoration (through pride of personal beauty); स्तोकाप्याकल्परचना विच्छित्तिः कांतिपोषकृत् <ls>S. D. 138.</ls>
